t: Best Ways to Exchange or Sell Unwanted Gift Cards

t: Amazon.com: Gift Card Swap
Select Your Card Currency for Amazon Currency Converter - Amazon Customer Service
s: Once you select your card currency, Amazon Currency Converter automatically displays your payment total in your card currency on the order summary page, or the product detail page for Buy Now ordering, so you know how much you're paying before you pay.
